TITLE.P: OFA — conference services 2018.01

SHORT_DESCR.P: The Contracting Authority would like to enter into parallel Framework Agreements for conference services for holding courses and conferences mainly within the Agder counties, as well as a few zones in Telemark and Vestfold counties. The contracts shall ensure good coverage and quality as regards the contracting authority´s needs for holding conferences, courses and day meetings. The tender is divided into the following 3 (three) different product areas: Overnight conferences / courses, day conferences / courses-ordinary and day conferences-low cost.

TITLE.P: Overnight conferences/courses - zone 2 - Risør

SHORT_DESCR.P: The contracting authority would like to enter into parallel framework agreements for conference services for holding courses and conferences mainly within the Agder counties, as well as a few zones in Telemark and Vestfold counties. The contracts shall ensure good coverage and quality as regards the contracting authority´s needs for holding conferences, courses and day meetings.
Arendal municipality, Arendal Eiendom KF, Arendal Havn KF, Aust-Agder County, Vest-Agder County and the County Governor Aust- og Vest-Agder.
See the tender documentation for further information.

The following contracting authorities have an option to join the contract and are exempted from the procurement obligation: Audnedal municipality, Lyngdal municipality, Bygland municipality, Mandal municipality, Bykle municipality, Marnardal municipality, Evje og Hornnes municipality, Risør municipality, Farsund municipality, Tvedestrand municipality, Froland municipality, Valle municipality, Flekkefjord municipality, Vegårshei municipality, Gjerstad municipality, Åmli municipality, Grimstad municipality, Åseral municipality, Hægebostad municipality, Lindesnes municipality, Iveland municipality, Sirdal municipality, Kvinesdal municipality, IKT Agder IKS, Aust-Agder museum og arkiv IKS, Agder Arbeidsmiljø IKS, Agder kollektivtrafikk AS, Agder Renovasjon IKS, Aust-Agder Revisjon IKS, Tannhelsetjenestens Kompetansesenter Sør IKS and Vest-Agder museet IKS.

INFO_ADD.P: *The contract will be valid for 2 years with an option to extend for up to a further 1+1 year.
The notice is based on the administrative structure on the date the contract is signed.

*New legal subjects that can come into being as a result of municipality and county mergers among the contract partners in the contract period will have the right to join the contract. (*See the tender documentation pages 18, 19 and 25 for a more detailed description.).
